attributes.additional_details:
To stop  the depletion of the UK armed forces a rearmament tax of 50 pence per week should be introduced for those on minimum income. This should rise to 1 pound per week for higher incomes.
This fund collected through taxation should be in  addition to the MODs current income.
This fund would be used to fund naval ship building programs as well as more ground based mechanised units.
This would ensure the security of our nation and that of our allies across the globe in todays unstable world.
